properties.validation-details-attribute-name:
/Code_specialite IS NOT NULL
AND /Fonction IS NOT NULL
AND /Specialite IS NOT NULL

properties.Replacement Value:
INSERT INTO dim_specialite (Code_specialite, Fonction, Specialite)
VALUES ('${Code_specialite}', '${Fonction}', '${Specialite}');
